Articles.Content:
Lampshade thrusters?

what is this, gmod?

what is this, gmod?

Maaaybaaaay...

I like the .5m capsule. It\'s a cute and economical way to send a kerbal to escape velocity on a small rocket.

They\'d make good lifeboats on larger craft too if they weren\'t primary command modules.
The camera looks like it\'d fit amazingly onto a Spirit style rover. =P

Progress is being made on the camera.

Orion Nuclear Propulsion System planned after Probodobodyne/SE2.

Then, space station parts

and finally, EVA plugin.

Then, I\'m free! Free forever!

To dredge up a few day old discussion, some people were mentioning the new fairing decouplers don\'t work; you need to activate the fairing decouplers on the stage before the decoupler base they\'re attached to in order to work, they\'ll just sit there and let your upper stages float through them if you fire them both at the same time.

I\'d hate to see you stop making things, Nova, but it\'s pretty awesome you have so much planned.

To dredge up a few day old discussion, some people were mentioning the new fairing decouplers don\'t work; you need to activate the fairing decouplers on the stage before the decoupler base they\'re attached to in order to work, they\'ll just sit there and let your upper stages float through them if you fire them both at the same time.

I\'d hate to see you stop making things, Nova, but it\'s pretty awesome you have so much planned.

Well, I have a Skyrim project to work on after that, then the long-term commitment to my music.

Well, I have a Skyrim project to work on after that, then the long-term commitment to my music.

I Used to be a kerbonaut like you, till I toke a micro meteor to the knee :\'(

I Used to be a kerbonaut like you, till I toke a micro meteor to the knee :\'(

So, will you not make any more mods after the Orion nuclear propulsion Nova? If so, I am sad man.

So, will you not make any more mods after the Orion nuclear propulsion Nova? If so, I am sad man.

You realize that this is very far away, right? There\'s an ENTIRE NEW PACK coming after that, so it should keep you satisfied ;P

Uhm

reentry heat plugin?

Uhm

reentry heat plugin?

That too. Maybe.

I\'ve just realized that that mini-capsule reminds me so much of. It\'s a diving bell, isn\'t it. The kerbals took a flipping diving bell, strapped it on top of a rocket bunch of dustbins filled with kerosene diesel and called it a day, didn\'t they.

FTFY.

But the diving bell thing is right on the mark.

Speaking of the oncoming multiplicity of fuel types, what with plugins and all, has anyone given thought to establishing some standard tables of Isp and how it ought to vary with engine size and sophistication? I haven\'t heard discussion of the sophistication angle, but it might make sense with the whole \'price\' thing to establish that a early model kerosene engine would have efficiency X whereas a second generation one would have Y.. it would give us something to stand on when mods/plugins have a tech tree behind them and we need early or late tech.

Silisko\'s ion thruster got me thinking in this direction, and I suspect more fuels are coming.
As the camera code is still being worked on heavily, I\'ll probably release an alpha version of probodobodyne containing all the stuff that works so far.

As the camera code is still being worked on heavily, I\'ll probably release an alpha version of probodobodyne containing all the stuff that works so far.

That would make all my studying completely impossible. Please do it anyway ;P

If I knowing nova, he will spend about 2 months on his skyrim mod and be back here.

(WARNING, I don\'t know nova well).

Well, I imagine he won\'t leave the forums, and the game, only modding.

I hope.
Great work Nova, busy playing with Probodobodyne set at the moment
Second landing on the Mun with the probodobodyne. Worked like a charm

and finally, EVA plugin.

E---V---A OMG I cant wait i feel like Freezing my save in a cryogenic Freezer just to see it
Question: Should my eventual space station pack be incorporated into BACE? That might be weird since the whole idea behind BACE is planetary structures.

Question: Should my eventual space station pack be incorporated into BACE? That might be weird since the whole idea behind BACE is planetary structures.

Spess station parts can be used for bases.

Spess station parts can be used for bases.

Hmm. Perhaps a lateral landing system for the standard station modules... I like that.

Also, starting work on Orion - I need a break from Probodobodyne for a bit. It will have a few parts: 1m, 2m, and 3m pusher plates and bomb salvos.

Can we test reentry heat along with the new probodobodyne?

Please?

:-*

Good luck on Orion.

Question: Should my eventual space station pack be incorporated into BACE? That might be weird since the whole idea behind BACE is planetary structures.

You could have special BACE pods that are meant to be attached to station parts, and that part of the station would be meant to go to the surface, as a larger base

Edit: Didn\'t see your reply
